title: Account issue
body:
hi

-- is my account and I could not be announce through that account and tried to return through email username and password, but does me the e-mail reaches of nothing

I ask the admin if you can help me back this account because I do not start with a game with a new account from scratch

thank prematurely

replies.body: I edited your post to remove personal details.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team can help with this as well as update your info.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
